pkgmetadata.longdescription: Variational Mode Decomposition // A port and extension to the original 'Matlab' code made public by Dragomiretskiy and Zosso, for conducting Variational Mode Decomposition (VMD) as described within their 2013 publication (publication: doi:10.1109/TSP.2013.2288675, source: https://goo.gl/fJH1d5).
